snippet: Hassan Nasrallah said his Shiite followers would not bend in the face of rising anti-Shiite sentiment among those who oppose his support for the Syrian government.
abstract: Hezbollah leader Hassan Nasrallah urges Arabs and Muslims to stay focused on opposing Israel despite bitter disagreements over militant group's involvement in Syrian war.
lead_paragraph: Hassan Nasrallah said his Shiite followers would not bend in the face of rising anti-Shiite sentiment among those who oppose his support for the Syrian government.

headline.main: Pressed on Syria, Hezbollah Leader Urges Focus on Israel
headline.print_headline: Pressed on Syria, Hezbollah Leader Urges Focus on Israel

keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
